word: \93One of the mothers in Israel came to me and said: \91Dear child, have you found Jesus?\92 I was about to answer, \91Yes,\92 when she exclaimed: \91Indeed you have, his peace is with you, I see it in your face!\92 Again and again I said to myself, \91Can this be religion? Am I not mistaken?\92 It seemed too much for me to claim, too exalted a privilege. Though too timid to openly confess it, I felt that the Saviour had blessed me and pardoned my sins.
